snippet: The current quarterback Greg McElroy and the former quarterback Boomer Esiason were scathing in their criticism of the Jets.
abstract: The current quarterback Greg McElroy and the former quarterback Boomer Esiason were scathing in their criticism of the Jets.
lead_paragraph: In separate radio interviews Wednesday, Jets quarterbacks past and present unloaded on the team for fostering a culture of dysfunction and selfishness. And neither of them was Joe Namath.

headline.main: Team Draws Criticism From Past and Present Jets
